description: Everybody loves a good threesome, so since it’s been a little while, we’ve decided it was about time! We couldn’t have picked better guys for this threesome. Randy, Dean and Cory are hot, playful, and horny as hell! It was so much fun watching these studs play some football on the beach, especially when even football terms became sexual innuendos… “We can run routes! Someone could play quarterback, someone could play defense, and someone is the receiver…you know?” Randy had a grin on his face. After getting the guys all sweaty and wet, they couldn’t wait to get back to the house for some real fun! Every hole was filled with dick, and cum was everywhere…‘hot’ can’t even begin to describe it!
title: Bareback Threeway with Randy, Dean & Cory
